Texas.title: Future Company Outlook; Percentage Reporting Decreases for Texas
Texas.notes: Future General Business Conditions, Company Outlook reports the likely direction of the company outlook for the manufacturing firm over the six months ahead for the state of Texas. The Company Outlook focuses on firms' perceptions of the broader business activity companywide. For further information regarding the Texas Manufacturing Outlook Survey release from the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas visit: https://www.dallasfed.org/research/surveys/tmos.aspx#tab-reports.

Texas.title: Future Company Outlook; Percentage Reporting Decreases for Texas
Texas.notes: Future General Business Conditions, Company Outlook, reports the likely direction of current general business conditions, company outlook, for the manufacturing sector over the six months ahead for the state of Texas. For further information regarding the Texas Manufacturing Outlook Survey release from the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas visit: https://www.dallasfed.org/research/surveys/tmos.aspx#tab-reports.
